channel.title: Need Help whit my new server
channel.description:
Hey a friend wants to quit whit his server so he give it to me, but i want to change the Server name :O when i log in it says : Welcome to -SERVERNAME-
And above in the corner is standing the server name and in the bank Welcome to the bank off -ServerName-
______________________
How can i change this in my server name :) thanks,, Crispp

item.title: Need Help whit my new server
item.dc:creator: @tim_moughtin tim_moughtin
item.description:
@tim_moughtin wrote:

you can also change the colour of the text displayed in the actual game screen if you wanted to know more about personalising your server name

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help whit my new server

item.title: Need Help whit my new server
item.dc:creator: @zxr3d_h0txz zxr3d h0txz
item.description:
@zxr3d_h0txz wrote:

ight well go to your folder and look for client.java the open it.then press control+f and type in welcome to servername and then replace from welcome to servername and thats it.and then try too look for more things that say server name and replace it with what ever you want ur server to be named.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help whit my new server
